name: Loonatic Vision
description:
Loonatic Vision is a horror game that takes place in a location that you wake up in. You don't know how you got there or why you are there.

Based by SCP: Containment Breach (2012)
http://www.scp-wiki.net/
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/

Loonatics Unleashed (c) Warner Brothers
